CONTACT_FMS.general_info: If you have any questions or require any help with your calculation, please contact us.

ABOUT.first_section: Customers of FMS Force Measuring Systems AG and its subsidiaries may use FMS Calculator free of charge.It may not be used for purposes not related with FMS force measuring sensors.This application or parts of it may not be redistributed or modified.
ABOUT.second_section: THIS SOFTWARE AND DOCUMENTATION IS PROVIDED "AS IS," AND COPYRIGHT HOLDERS MAKE NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
ABOUT.third_section: COPYRIGHT HOLDERS WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF ANY USE OF THE SOFTWARE OR DOCUMENTATION.

CHANGELOG.3_3_first: Release Notes for Version 3.3 deployed on 13.06.2020
CHANGELOG.3_3_second: - New PDF output: new layout, including project and calculation information, additional measurements and output values.
CHANGELOG.3_3_third: - Introduction of the Gain Calculator: Calculate gain values needed for FMS amplifiers.
CHANGELOG.3_3_fourth: - Various small bug fixes and improvements.
CHANGELOG.3_2_first: Release Notes for Version 3.2 deployed on 13.02.2020
CHANGELOG.3_2_second: - New Project functionality: Saved work is always in the context of a project. Each project can contain any number of calculations. Calculations can be versioned.
CHANGELOG.3_2_third: - New Collaboration functionality: Projects can be shared with other Calculator users who can access calculations that are part of the project and add new ones to it.
CHANGELOG.3_2_fourth: - Update to include new FMS order codes and H-options
CHANGELOG.3_4_first: Release Notes for Version 3.4 deployed on 18.02.2021
CHANGELOG.3_4_second: - Downloadcenter on PDF output: Direct access to datasheet, CAD data and Calculation.
CHANGELOG.3_4_third: - Support for V05 amplifiers in Gain Calculator.
CHANGELOG.3_5_first: - Improved overview for calculations with multiple versions.
CHANGELOG.3_5_second: - Additional selections like sensor material etc. where applicable.
CHANGELOG.3_5_releaseNotes: Release Notes for Version 3.5 deployed on 04.05.2023

GLOBAL.values_will_be_deleted: If you want to continue entered values will be deleted!
GLOBAL.sensor_not_selected: These parts of the Calculator are only available for logged in users.
GLOBAL.auth_sensor_not_selected: Please choose a sensor type first.

FORCES.fmr_min_bigger_fmr_max: The FBmin should always be smaller or equal the FBmax.
FORCES.fmr_min_bigger_fmr_max_width: The Tension/web min width should always be smaller or equal the Tension/web max width

OPTIONS.offset_connector_red_opposite: connector offset 90°, red point on opposite side of connector
OPTIONS.for_vacuum_pressure_150: vacuum to 1E-7 hPa , 1E-5 Torr, up to  150°C (302°F), with pg-gland and 5 m (16 ft.) cable
OPTIONS.for_vacuum_150: temperature range up to 150°C (302°F), with pg-gland and 5 m (16 ft.) cable

CALCULATOR.fmr_tooltip: Angle between the measuring direction and the resulting force due to tension
CALCULATOR.r_tooltip: Orientation of the Red Point (Measuring direction)
CALCULATOR.red_percent_tooltip: If the force is not applied vertically, vertical blocks can only measure a reduced force. The derating percentage shows the measurable force percentage for the current angle.
CALCULATOR.nominal_forces_tooltip: Additional nominal forces are available on request.

NOTIFICATIONS.Unfortunately, we could not find a suita: Unfortunately, we could not find a suitable proposal. More nominal forces are available on request.

NOTIFICATIONS.select_sensor_type_to_print: You should select sensor type to print

VALIDATION.password: Should be at least 8 characters long
VALIDATION.phone: Should contain only digits and a '+' sign (from 5 to 20 digits)
VALIDATION.number: Should be an integer greater than 0
VALIDATION.checkbox: You have to choose one of the options

GAIN.title: Calculation data
GAIN.param_digital: Values for parameterisation of digital amplifiers (EMGZ309/310/321, EMGZ491/492)
GAIN.param_analog: Values for parameterisation of analog amplifiers (EMGZ306.CAL)
GAIN.meaning_309: EMGZ309/310/321: When using this Gain Value, the display shows the real material tension.
GAIN.meaning_49x: EMGZ491/492: When using this Gain Value, the bus outputs the real material tension.
